argumentText:
ARGUMENT
s w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | issubg.b | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | #P_df-subg | |- SubGrp = ( w e. Grp |-> { s e. ~P ( Base ` w ) | ( w |`s s ) e. Grp } ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_dmmptss | |- dom SubGrp C_ Grp |
| 4 |  | #P_elfvdm | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. dom SubGrp ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sseldi | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) -> G e. Grp ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( w = G -> ( Base ` w ) = ( Base ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( w = G -> ( Base ` w ) = B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_pweqd | |- ( w = G -> ~P ( Base ` w ) = ~P B ) |
| 10 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( w = G -> ( w |`s s ) = ( G |`s s ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( w = G -> ( ( w |`s s ) e. Grp <-> ( G |`s s ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 12 | 9, 11 | #P_rabeqbidv | |- ( w = G -> { s e. ~P ( Base ` w ) | ( w |`s s ) e. Grp } = { s e. ~P B | ( G |`s s ) e. Grp } ) |
| 13 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( Base ` G ) e. _V |
| 14 | 1, 13 | #P_eqeltri | |- B e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_pwex | |- ~P B e. _V |
| 16 | 15 | #P_rabex | |- { s e. ~P B | ( G |`s s ) e. Grp } e. _V |
| 17 | 12, 2, 16 | #P_fvmpt | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( SubGrp ` G ) = { s e. ~P B | ( G |`s s ) e. Grp } ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> S e. { s e. ~P B | ( G |`s s ) e. Grp } ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( s = S -> ( G |`s s ) = ( G |`s S ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( s = S -> ( ( G |`s s ) e. Grp <-> ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_elrab | |- ( S e. { s e. ~P B | ( G |`s s ) e. Grp } <-> ( S e. ~P B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 22 | 14 | #P_elpw2 | |- ( S e. ~P B <-> S C_ B ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_anbi1i | |- ( ( S e. ~P B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 24 | 21, 23 | #P_bitri | |- ( S e. { s e. ~P B | ( G |`s s ) e. Grp } <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) |
| 25 | 18, 24 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 26 |  | #P_ibar | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) ) ) |
| 27 | 25, 26 | #P_bitrd | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) ) ) |
| 28 |  | #P_3anass | |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ ( S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 29 | 27, 28 | #P_syl6bbr | |- ( G e. Grp -> ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) ) |
| 30 | 5, 6, 29 | #P_pm5.21nii | |- ( S e. ( SubGrp ` G ) <-> ( G e. Grp /\ S C_ B /\ ( G |`s S ) e. Grp ) ) |
